name: Musicly
body:
### Usage
#### Add to queue
You can add music to the queue by mentioning musicly and linking a Youtube video
`@musicly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ`

#### View queue
You can view the next 5 songs in the queue to asking about them
`What songs are in the queue?`

#### View next song
You can also ask about the next song
`What's the next song?`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
